version_description: This update includes some more fixes, mostly of minor issues. Additionally we cleaned up certain parts of the code for a smoother user experience, and we slightly improved the Watch app and the large Watch complication, which now also shows the dew point

This update includes some more fixes, mostly of minor issues. Additionally we cleaned up certain parts of the code for a smoother user experience, and we slightly improved the Watch app and the large Watch complication, which now also shows the dew point

v2.0.15 fixes a Celsius - Fahrenheit conversion issue in the dew point calculation within the Watch App.

v2.0.14: This update includes some more fixes, mostly of minor issues. Additionally we cleaned up certain parts of the code for a smoother user

v2.0.15 fixes a Celsius - Fahrenheit conversion issue in the dew point calculation within the Watch App.

v2.0.14: This update includes some more fixes, mostly of minor issues. Additionally we cleaned up certain parts of the code for a smoother user

This update includes some minor improvements and an optimized chart generation in the module overview: when scrolling through the overview, diagrams are only regenerated when needed. This ensures a smoother scrolling and an improved overall impression.<br

This update includes some minor improvements and an optimized chart generation in the module overview: when scrolling through the overview, diagrams are only regenerated when needed. This ensures a smoother scrolling and an improved overall impression.<br

v2.0.17: This update includes a critical fix for an issue that caused the data of indoor sensors to mix up if you have more than one additional indoor sensor installed. Additionally we have included some performance optimizations.

v2.0.16: This upd

v2.0.17: This update includes a critical fix for an issue that caused the data of indoor sensors to mix up if you have more than one additional indoor sensor installed. Additionally we have included some performance optimizations.

• New: in the area map Premium users can now save their favorite locations, load t

Once again we implemented user requests and a few optimizations and bug fixes:

• New: the annual comparison chart now allows a monthly comparison, meaning that all days of a month are compared over 4 years in terms of daily averages. Premium users

Dear myatmo users, once again we have come up with something new for you and built it into myatmo: a visualization of the barometric pressure changes. Perfect to understand and track the sometimes rapid pressure drops before and during the next storm in a

Dear myatmo users, once again we have come up with something new for you and built it into myatmo: a visualization of the barometric pressure changes. Perfect to understand and track the sometimes rapid pressure drops before and during the next storm in a

Nothing dramatic this time; but since we always want you to have a perfectly working version of myatmo, we post a small update this week, which is 'again' related to a problem with the netatmo data server. We sometimes wonder if this will ever stop ... :o

Nothing dramatic this time; but since we always want you to have a perfectly working version of myatmo, we post a small update this week, which is 'again' related to a problem with the netatmo data server. We sometimes wonder if this will ever stop ... :o
